sentences.en: ...homemade oatmeal with brown sugar and raisins.
sentences.cn: …自家煮的放有红糖和葡萄干的麦片粥。

sentences.en: " Here's a bit of raisin bread for you; eat it tomorrow.
sentences.cn: “ 这一包是葡萄浆的面包,请你收藏着, 明天好吃的.

sentences.en: Annual production of raisins: red raisins, yellow raisins, green raisins and all kinds of cream raisin.
sentences.cn: 常年生产各种葡萄干: 有红葡萄干 、 黄葡萄干 、 绿葡萄干和各种奶油葡萄干.

sentences.en: Ingredient: Apple, lemon grass, orange pericarp, spice, hip pericarp, raisin, hibiscus.
sentences.cn: 成份: 苹果 、 柠檬草 、 柑橘皮 、 香料 、 蔷薇果皮 、 葡萄干 、 芙蓉(木槿).

sentences.en: Its world was loaves of Raisin Bread.
sentences.cn: 它的世界是葡萄干面包.

sentences.en: Pan breads such as raisin bread and whole - wheat bread are considered to be yeast breads.
sentences.cn: 例如葡萄干面包和全麦面包就是发酵面包.

sentences.en: Pretty much , a raisin is just a dried grape!
Q : Why did the olive go out with the raisin?
sentences.cn: 为什么橄榄要跟葡萄干出去?

sentences.en: Raisin my fingers to critics; raisin my head to the sky.
sentences.cn: 指责评论家们, 抬头仰望天空.

sentences.en: Sautee spinach , pine nut and raisin with a dash of salt and pepper.
sentences.cn: 菠菜与松子、葡萄干和少许调味料(盐、胡椒粉)一起快炒.

sentences.en: Sustain me with raisin cakes , Refresh me with apples, Because I am lovesick.
sentences.cn: 歌2:5求你们给我葡萄乾增补我力 、 我苹果畅快我心.我思爱成病.

sentences.en: Sustain me with raisin cakes, Refresh me with apples, For am sick with love.
sentences.cn: 求你们用葡萄饼增补我力,用苹果使我苏醒, 因为我因爱成病.

sentences.en: The pancakes come about a dozen varieties: sugar, ginger, apple, raisin and so on.
sentences.cn: 这些馅饼夹有许多种馅: 有糖 、 姜 、 苹果 、 葡萄干等.

sentences.en: The pancakes come in about a dozen varieties: sugar, ginger, apple, raisin and so on.
sentences.cn: 馅饼有许多种的馅: 有糖 、 姜 、 苹果 、 葡萄干等.

sentences.en: Through the centuries scholars devoted their lives to the study of Raisin Bread.
sentences.cn: 通过世纪学者献身于葡萄干面包的研究.

sentences.en: Why does an onion bagel cost more than a raisin bagel?
sentences.cn: 为什么洋葱百吉饼会比.提子百吉饼卖得还贵?
